sentences.english: Jacobian matrix is one of the important parameters of robots.
sentences.chinese: 雅可比矩阵是描述机器人特征的重要参数之一。

sentences.english: Therefore, collectivity design on The Underwater Ship Hull Cleaning Robot is finished.
sentences.chinese: 完成了船体表面清刷机器人的总体设计。

sentences.english: They send in the robots to do the work.
sentences.chinese: 他们把机器人送进去完成工作。

sentences.english: The buzz droids are designed to disable, not destroy, enemy craft.
sentences.chinese: 蜂鸣机器人的设计目的是瘫痪，而非摧毁敌机。

sentences.english: Goldberg said researchers have been working with robots for 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 戈尔德贝尔格说研究人员50年来一直研究机器人。

sentences.english: This means that there are two big unknowns about the robot.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着这款机器人存在着两大疑点。

sentences.english: The fighter also carried an astromech droid for onboard repairs.
sentences.chinese: 战斗机上也有宇航技工机器人负责机载维修。

sentences.english: Use our robot parts list to help get you started.
sentences.chinese: 用我们的机器人零件清单也会帮助你开始。

sentences.english: It flamed out and fell heavily on the table.
sentences.chinese: 那机器人最终喷出火花重重地摔在桌面上。

sentences.english: This study made an attempt for chaotic anti-control application in the ocean reconnaissance robot.
sentences.chinese: 为混沌反控制在海洋侦察机器人的应用做了尝试。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the design and realization of the main control software system of the robot glazing system.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍了机器人施釉主控软件系统的设计与实现。

sentences.english: They think that robots will be able to talk to people in 25 to 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 他们相信在25至50年以后机器人将能够和人对话。

sentences.english: Dooku couldn't quite see the other droid around the edge of the alcove.
sentences.chinese: 杜库从壁龛的角上看不太清楚另一个机器人。

sentences.english: Ore Collectors have secondary abilities that are very effective against Terror Drones.
sentences.chinese: 矿车的第二能力对抗恐怖机器人都是非常有效的。

sentences.english: We may not be able to move mountains with our minds, but robots will await our mental commands.
sentences.chinese: 我们的思想无法移山，但可以命令机器人。

sentences.english: This paper can provide reference for the global design of Dragon of Puncturing Mud Robot.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果可为穿地龙机器人的总体设计提供参考。

definition: computer numerical control machine tool (CNC machine tool)
